Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Food and taste 4*.. ambience 5*. Speaks English perfectly when you oder! Good place to  dine- in. Enjoy the great music. Had great outdoor seating with the great view of busy streets.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text:
The food was not fresh, it was not good. The old salad used in the burger took the taste away from the burger. The fries were good. A place called Downtown burger has only 3 choices of burger. The rest were fish and salad, pasta , etc...
Awesome location by the way.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Great lil place, had one of the juiciest burger with chips(fries) here, staff at reception was really friendly although the interaction with the waitress was a bit strange but I highly recommend burgers here.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Great services lovely food and great cocktails. Went here for breakfast. Very friendly staff would highly recommend this place. what's the crack ü§£

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Nice restaurant for burgers and other dishes like typical german Schnitzel. Ita a small place but still never a problem to find a seat. Friendly and helpful staff, with great service. Location is next to Red Light District which is very handy if you stay in a hotel nearby. I recommend this restaurant to anyone!

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text:
Really bad service, need to be more friendly and customer oriented, very cheap quality food and at the end, they were confident enaugh to ask for a tip.
Stay. Away. from this place.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Well, nice and friendly staff but that isn't all. Mediocre burger, got a one with some sliced beef. Not that tender och for that matter not enogh for that price. Good fries.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Just delicious we had our perfect diner and the personal was helpful and friendly

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: The food was decent, pretty good I would say. The fries where good, the burger was a bit overcoocked, would have prefered it a bit more rare. The service though was subpar. Had to ask 3 times for the check before I actually got it.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text:
Very kind and wonderful people the food was delicious with no doubt
We suggest it perfect for a relaxed dinner

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text:
the dishes are impressive big portions with very good quality
Plus the people are so kind and helpful

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Nice place, good food, service was fine! Pretty central place in the Nieuw Markt, for such a central place it's pretty good for lunch or dinner. We enjoyed it.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: The food was okay but not really good. The variety of dishes for vegetariens is very small, but for meat eaters big. The Hygiene was okay, but not great. We wouldn't go there a second time.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Best burger in the area. Don't mess about go straight for the Angus 300gm with bacon & cheese

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text:
Slow for food to come.  Bread was the most dry and chewy gluten loaded I have experienced in Europe, had to eat the salad and meat and leave the bread.
And coffee weak and pale.
Disappointing.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: The food is not fresh at all. Although the place is good and well situated. Won‚Äôt come back

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: The best food and the best stuff in town. You must go for sure!

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: The barmen was very rude, a lot of ice in our whiskey and we were refused on the last round of drinks. Never again!

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: A little but cozy. I like the old Hollywood vibe. Food is fine and reasonably priced. Staff are courteous.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: I had the California burger and cheese fries and a long beach iced tea. All was well the burger was huge and the service was nice.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Ordered the pull pork burger. Tender and marinated well with the BBQ sauce. And it's huge.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Service left something to be desired. Front staff throughout our meal reached across our table to remove and replaced a menu as trying to show passing pedestrians without any acknowledgment or apology for interrupting our meal (let alone ‚Ä¶

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Great little place to eat close to the centre. Lovely burgers highly recommend, initially had a bad experience when we first arrived was served by a very rude lady. Then we had a different server who changed our whole experience and the food was great. If you go hopefully you wont get served by the same lady I did.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Absolutely terrible service. The dark haired waitress was bubbly and friendly, however the other one clearly doesn't want to be here and goes out of her way to make everyone else feel the same. For a burger joint, I find it very intriguing ‚Ä¶

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Good burgers really nice location

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: I appreciated it was open that late (around midnight). BUT : whereas fries were fine, the burger was really NOT good : the bread was lame, the meat not tasty & the guy dared to charge 1‚Ç¨ extra for some cheese I even didn't FEEL. When I told ‚Ä¶

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Not so good food

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text:
Terrible. They messed up our ticket for two of us, and put in an order for 6 people who sat after us, so we end up waiting 40min or longer.
When the burger comes out, it is completely over cooked and gross, I wouldn‚Äôt ‚Ä¶

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Great location and service, but what really steals the show is the massive burger. It's huge... Like the size of my head. I didnt think I'd be able to finish it, but the bread was so buttery and crisp.. the meat so savoury. All I could do was eat until it was nothing but a fond memory. I guess I'm really off my diet now...

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text:
Cheap and cheerful! Big portion of chips and burger was tasty (for the price)
Manager kept coming and checking on us/ standing near us, which made us a little uncomfortable.. but this meant the service was quick! ‚Ä¶

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Delicious food, Maxwell was great and helpful, young hard working, the first person to every table, and amazing social skills.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text:
Service very slow. We got our food after am hour. Food very dry. Burger without any sauce. The only good thing was the beer.
The price of our evening terribly high and due to a not working water suspender I sliced my middlefinger bad.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text:
Burgers were great, Steak was delicious, the fries were crispy and the drinks were huge.
Wish we could have come back for breakfast! ‚Ä¶

Name: Down Town Burger

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Food not that bad as you could expect, but cheap flirt from the waiter in my boyfriend presence is crazy rude. Don't call anyone 'sexy' at work. BTW most girls will smile because they are polite, not interested. This situation was just inappropriate and embarrassing.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Worst experience in Amsterdam. If you ask for moustard they'll charge as a sauce. Careful you may pay 3‚Ç¨ for a dip of mustard. The combo thats a burguer + fries + "salad" is a big lie. The salad its just what they usually put inside thw ‚Ä¶

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Cannot recommend. Good location, service was fast to gather the order, however food was not good. Burger was served bone dry and no sauces on the burger. French fries were hot but not dressed with salt or any spices.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: We had 2 burger and fries which was really disgusting. we paid 25 euros, for me it is too expensive. ( i miss you berlin) the kitchen was in very dirty condition and service crew dont mind about their personal hygiene.

Name: Down Town Burger

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Staff were very polite and friendly

Name: Down Town Burger

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: The food is ok and price reasonable. But the waitress attitude was one of the worst I experienced having traveled to many places. She is extremely rude and treat customers based on skin color though she is black herself.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text:

Angus Burger tastes like overspiced cheap meat. Burger came without any sauce or ketchup and was dry. Chees on cheese fries was like tasteless goo. NOT RECOMMENDED !

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: We give this knok off of a real american diner one star out of 5 simply because of the lack of quality of the food. To start off the milkshake is a HUGE  RIP OFF!!! The burgers were tasteless and so were the cheese fries, the cheese tasted like hot tasteless goo. THE FOOD IS OVERPRICED AND NOT WORTH IT!

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Not good. not Bad. Pretty average.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: The service was nice and kind, but they should delete 'burger' out of their name and place 'burn meat' instead. If you are searching a good burger in Amsterdam go for Burger Bar!

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text:
Excellent food

The RIBS IS ONE OF THE BEST I HAVE TASTED AND I LOVE MY MEATS!

Name: Down Town Burger

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Very bad place, I ordered a Chouffe and they didn't open the bottle in front of me, I understand why, it was a very bad beer inside. They filled the bottle with beer from the tap. I don't recommand it at all!!!

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: The place is nicely decked up American style however the burger was too simple and towards dry.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Friendly staff, food tasted good but was undercooked. My beef burger was very red in the middle and my friends chicken burger was still raw in the centre.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Good burgers, excellent staff, had a fantastic meal. Ok prices and quick service. Cosy place for a quick bite.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Just stopped for a drink along a quaint street near a canal. Good service, cold beer, good wine and good location. Fun and friendly place to stop.

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Good service, great food, super portions! Lovely cocktails!

Name: Down Town Burger
Review Text: Long wait, burgers are dry, no saus, overcooked, paid extra for cheese and its barely melted. Disappointed all around.

Name: Down Town Burger
